Introduction

Yuto is a Japanese rapper, singer-songwriter, and the lead rapper of PENTAGON. He debuted with the group on October 10, 2016, with the mini-album PENTAGON.

On October 9, 2023, Cube Entertainment announced that Yuto had ended his exclusive contract along with four other members of PENTAGON. Shortly after, on October 26, he signed with RINK Entertainment.

On November 12, 2023, it was announced that Yuto would make his solo debut with the single Dat Girl on December 13, marking his first release as a solo artist.
